welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hurlingham, Argentina! Get ready to be captivated by the city's charming streets, rich cultural heritage, and beautiful green spaces. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Parrilla La Candelaria
restaurants.description: Parrilla La Candelaria is a argentinian restaurant located in Hurlingham.
